snippet: Tina Maze was placed under police protection for a super-G race in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany, after she received an e-mailed death threat.
abstract: Skier Tina Maze is placed under police protection for super-G race in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany, after she receives e-mailed death threat; other winter sports items noted.
lead_paragraph: Tina Maze was placed under police protection for a super-G race in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany, after she received an e-mailed death threat.

headline.seo: Tina Maze Under Police Protection After Threat
headline.main: Maze Under Police Protection After Threat
